text: The 2019 BreakTudo Awards (also known as BTDAs 2019) were held on October 20, 2019 in São Paulo, Brazil. Tiago Fabri and Alexandre Duarte hosted the annual event. The nominations were announced on August 22, 2019; Anitta, Ariana Grande and J Balvin led the list with five nominations each. == Winners and nominees == The nominees were revealed on August 22, 2019, through a post on the official website. Fans could vote from September 1, 2019. Winners were revealed on October 20, 2019. === Brazilian Female Artist === *Anitta *Ivete Sangalo *IZA *Lexa *Ludmilla *Luisa Sonza *Marília Mendonça *Paula Fernandes === Brazilian Male Artist === *Luan Santana *Alok *Jão *Kevinho *Leo Santana *Lucas Lucco *Projota *Tiago Iorc === International Female Artist === *Cardi B *Ariana Grande *Billie Eilish *Halsey *Lady Gaga *Taylor Swift ===International Male Artist=== *Shawn Mendes *Drake *Ed Sheeran *Khalid *Lil Nas X *Sam Smith ===Brazilian Duo/Group=== *Sandy & Junior *Anavitória *Fly *Jorge & Mateus *Maiara & Maraisa *Matheus & Kauan *Melim *Simone & Simaria === International Duo/Group === *BTS *5 Seconds of Summer *Jonas Brothers *Little Mix *The Chainsmokers *The Vamps === Brazilian Fandom === *Anitta *Irmãos Berti *Claudia Leitte *Larissa Manoela *Luan Santana *Sophia Abrahão *Pabllo Vittar *Ivete Sangalo === International Fandom === *BTS *Ariana Grande *Camila Cabello *CNCO *Louis Tomlinson *Shawn Mendes *Selena Gomez *Miley Cyrus ===Brazilian Hit of the Year=== *Joelma – "Ai Baby" *Tropkillaz, J Balvin and Anitta (featuring MC Zaac) – "Bola Rebola" *Ludmilla (featuring Felipe Araújo) – "Clichê" *Gabriel Diniz – "Jenifer" *Paula Fernandes and Luan Santana – "Juntos" *Lexa (featuring Glória Groove) – "Provocar" *Claudia Leitte (featuring Hungria Hip Hop) – "Saudade" *Luan Santana (featuring MC Kekel) – "Vingança" ===Brazilian Music Video of the Year=== *Luísa Sonza and Pabllo Vittar – "Garupa" *Emicida, Majur and Pabllo Vittar – "AmarElo" *IZA – "Brisa" *Tropkillaz, Rincon Sapiência and Clau – "Dame Mais" *Jão – "Me Beija Com Raiva" *Drik Barbosa (featuring Gloria Groove, Karol Conka and Mirella Barbosa) – "Quem Tem Joga" *Francinne and Clau – "Segue o Baile" *Anitta and Kevinho – "Terremoto" ===International Hit of the Year=== *DJ Snake (featuring Selena Gomez, Ozuna and Cardi B) – "Taki Taki" *Rosalía and J Balvin (featuring El Guincho) – "Con altura" *Sam Smith and Normani – "Dancing with a Stranger" *Ed Sheeran and Justin Bieber – "I Don't Care" *Lil Nas X (featuring Billy Ray Cyrus) – "Old Town Road (Remix)" *Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello – "Señorita" *Ariana Grande – "Thank U, Next" *Halsey – "Without Me" === International Music Video of the Year === *Blackpink – "Kill This Love" *Billie Eilish – "Bad Guy" *Madonna – "God Control" *Marshmello and Bastille – "Happier" *Katy Perry – "Never Really Over" *John Legend – "Preach" *Iggy Azalea – "Sally Walker" *Jonas Brothers – "Sucker" *Taylor Swift - "You Need to Calm Down" === Boom Video of the Year === *Blackpink – "Kill This Love" *BTS (featuring Halsey) – "Boy with Luv" *Pedro Capó and Farruko – "Calma" *Rosalía and J Balvin (featuring El Guincho) – "Con altura" *Daddy Yankee and Snow – "Con Calma" *Taylor Swift (featuring Brendon Urie of Panic! at the Disco) – "Me!" *Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello – "Señorita" *Ariana Grande – "Thank U, Next" ===Collaboration of the Year=== *Dua Lipa and Blackpink – "Kiss and Make Up" *Ellie Goulding, Diplo and Red Velvet – "Close to Me (Red Velvet Remix)" *Daddy Yankee and Katy Perry (featuring Snow) – "Con Calma (Remix)" *Jason Derulo and David Guetta (featuring Nicki Minaj and Willy William) – "Goodbye" *Mark Ronson and Miley Cyrus – "Nothing Breaks Like a Heart" *Khalid and Kane Brown – "Saturday Nights" *David Guetta, Bebe Rexha and J
